headline: Do You Believe in the Growth Potential of PPG Industries (PPG)?
summary: Pzena Investment Management recently released its third-quarter 2025 commentary for “Pzena Focused Value Strategy.” A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Driven by optimism about AI and a September rate cut, US broad-based indexes surged in the third quarter. The technology sector was the strongest performer, with growth outpacing value.
